text:
(1)
South 8th Street, at the East River, showing the bowsprit of the schooner "Gerbeviller"; the storage yards of the Columbia Steel Tube Co., and buildings on the east side of Kent Ave., north from South 8th Street (right) to Broadway (left).
March 24, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
A view to the north, up the East River, showing the Williamsburg Bridge.
March 24, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.
